text: Reynold Nelson Hoover (born May 2, 1961) is a lieutenant general in the United States Army, who served as the deputy commander of the United States Northern Command. ==Education== Hoover is a 1983 graduate of the United States Military Academy. He later earned an M.A. in Public-Private Management from Birmingham–Southern College, a J.D. from the Columbus School of Law and a Master of Strategic Studies degree from the United States Army War
